issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.description:
priority of MRAppMasterShutdownHook  is 30, while priority of TaskLogHook is 50. 
when a applicationMaster received a signal to shutdown, actually TaskLogHook  will be called first. Then when MRAppMasterShutdownHook  be called next, no logs can be output.
fields.summary: logs in  MRAppMasterShutdownHook can not be output, beacuse Hook of Tasklog will be called to shutdown LogManager previously
